amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of the Interior, as part of the management plan, to ensure that the designation as a Biosphere Reserve does not affect State or local government revenue, including revenue for public education programs. \ As amended by the Young (AK) amendment (A005) language was added to clarify that such designation shall not adversely affect State and local government revenue.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered four and printed in the Congressional Record to require that the management plan specifically ensures that the designation as a Biosphere Reserve does not affect State or local government revenue, including revenue for public education programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sweeney amendment (A004) as amended Agreed to by recorded vote: 407 - 15 (Roll no. 143).
